channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Indiana QB Fernando Mendoza wins the Heisman

item.title: Two killed, 8 injured in shooting at Brown University
item.description: Two people have been killed and 8 others injured in a shooting at Brown University , the university said Saturday. The shooting was reported at the Ba...

item.title: More money, more corruption require more attention, nonprofit says
item.description: OpenSecrets, which started four decades ago, is renewing its drive to help voters follow the money between special interests and government officials.

item.title: U.S. unseals warrant behind oil tanker seizure near Venezuela
item.description: A newly unsealed warrant shows the U.S. Coast Guard seized the M/T Skipper, a crude oil tanker intercepted off Venezuela, just before the warrant was ...

item.title: OpenAI isn't too big to fail. It's bigger.
item.description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman is feeling the heat from Google, continued lawsuits from families and more than $1 trillion in spending promises on the line. Wh...

item.title: Donald Trump is known for firing people. But not this year.
item.description: Some Republicans watching Trump’s second term say there’s a different dynamic this term: The president is surrounded by people who don’t challenge him...

item.title: Trump leans into isolation as challenges mount at home
item.description: As the administration enters choppy political waters, it has redoubled its pushback against foreign people, products and cultures.

item.title: Trump takes first step in possible bid to control D.C.’s public golf courses
item.description: The administration puts National Links Trust on the clock with notice that jeopardizes the lease.

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Voters sour on Trump’s handling of the economy in new poll
item.description: The White House plans to make affordability a key selling point for Republicans across the board as the 2026 midterm elections come into focus.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
